data.title: St. Petersburg College
data.text:
APPOINTMENTS

Schedule a meeting with your assigned advisor, either in-person, virtually using Teams or by phone. To schedule, click on your home campus or the home campus of your assigned advisor below. Don't know your home campus? Check out How to Locate Your Assigned Advisor to find your advisor.

Note: The last day for scheduled appointments will be July 19, 2024. There are no appointments available during peak registration - Appointments will resume Tuesday, August 20, 2024.

Clearwater

Downtown Center

Health Education Center

Midtown Center

Seminole

St. Petersburg/Gibbs

Tarpon Springs

VIRTUAL ADVISING CENTER

Connect with the first available advisor in our Virtual Advising Center using your Student ID. You will need to sign in at least 30 minutes before closing.

Monday-Thursday

8:30 a.m. - 8 p.m.

Friday

8:30 a.m. - 5 p.m.

Saturday

10 a.m. - 3 p.m.

CAMPUS HOURS

You can visit a campus for walk-in advising with the first available advisor during the following hours.

Monday-Thursday

8:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m.

Friday

8:30 a.m. - 1 p.m.
